record.file.name: category

brief.brief: An expression that Service Manager evaluates when setting up a reassignment alert.

If this condition is true, Service Manager uses this expression instead of the value in the Reassignment Alert Interval field to escalate a record from the corresponding alert to the next alert level.
If this field is empty (NULL), or if the condition is unknown or false, Service Manager uses the alert interval.

detail.detail: Expressions should always be of the form:
Use $file to refer to the current page.
When using this expression to recalculate alert times, use the time of day function (tod()) for the start time of the calculation.
Put the result of the expression in the alert.time field. For example, if severity in $file="3" then alert.time in $file=tod() +'00:10:00'.
